sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    //- b-container#SkAwEdList
    //-     div.text-center
    //-         h3(style="margin-bottom:0px;") Carlos E. Orama De Jesus
    //-         small Game & Junior Web Developer
    //-         br(style="margin-bottom:5px;")
    //-         b-row
    //-             b-col() SolAZDev@gmail.com
    //-             b-col() 939-244-2231
    //-             b-col() PO Box 1126, Gurabo, PR 00778 
    //-     // br(style="margin-bottom:5px;")
    //-     div.text-center
    //-         h4 Current Career Objective
    //-         p Game designer and developer, who’s looking for a position where I can use the best of my abilities to push the projects forward, and meet or even exceed the company’s goals and expectations proficiently. With the ability to reuse existing bases and creating new models, be it for Games, Software, 3D Models, or Web Pages. Looking for opportunities for personal contribution and professional growth.
    //-     // br(style="margin-bottom:5px;")
    //-     b-row
    //-         b-col(sm="12" md="6")
    //-             h5 Major Skills
    //-             ul
    //-                 li Highly Motivated
    //-                 li Strong Attention to Detail
    //-                 li Front-End Web Design & Development
    //-                 li C#, Typescript, Bash, Linux OS
    //-                 li 3D Modeling & Printing
    //-                 li Game Development with Unity
    //-                 li Set & Level Design
    //-                 li Video Editing & Key-frame Animation
    //-                 li Fully Bilingual: English & Spanish
    //-         b-col(sm="12" md="6")
    //-             h5 Minor Skills
    //-             ul 
    //-                 li UX & UI Design
    //-                 li Code Documentation with Doxygen
    //-                 li Story Writing and Storyboarding
    //-                 li Multi-Phase Planning
    //-     b-row
    //-         b-col(sm="12" md="6")
    //-             h5 Education
    //-             ul
    //-                 li Atlantic University College (2011-2015)
    //-                     br
    //-                     small Bachelor’s Dregree in Video Gqame Design
    //-         b-col(sm="12" md="6")
    //-             h5 Awards
    //-             ul
    //-                 li Eagle Scout Rank 
    //-                     br
    //-                     small Boy Scouts of America (T432)
    //-                 li Best Use of Theme Overall (Local)
    //-                     br
    //-                     small PR Global Game Jam 2018
    div
        b-container#SkAwEdList
            div.text-center
                h3(style="margin-bottom: 0px;") {{$data.resume.name}}
                small {{$data.resume.title}}
                br(style="margin-bottom: 5px;")
                b-row
                    b-col {{$data.resume.email}}
                    b-col {{$data.resume.phone}}
                    b-col {{$data.resume.address}}
            div.text-center
                h4 Current Career Objective
                p {{$data.resume.currentObjective}}
            b-row
                b-col(sm="12" md="6")
                    h5 Major Skills
                    ul
                        li(v-for="skill in $data.resume.majorSkills") {{skill}}
                b-col(sm="12" md="6")
                    h5 Minor Skills
                    ul
                        li(v-for="skill in $data.resume.minorSkills") {{skill}}
            b-row
                b-col(sm="12" md="6")
                    h5 Education
                    ul
                        li(v-for="edu in $data.resume.education") {{edu.institute}} - ({{edu.years}})
                            br
                            small {{edu.degree}}
                b-col(sm="12" md="6")
                    h5 Awards
                    ul
                        li(v-for="award in $data.resume.awards") {{award.award}}
                            br
                            small {{award.from}}
        b-container-fluid#SkAwEdList
            div.text-center
                h4 Work Experience
                b-row
                    b-col(sm="12" lg="4" v-for="job in $data.resume.workExperience")
                        table.table
                            tr
                                td Position
                                td {{job.job}}
                            tr
                                td Employer
                                td {{job.employer}} ({{job.location}})
                            tr
                                td During
                                td {{job.time}}
                            tr
                                td Responsibilities
                                td
                                    ul.text-left
                                        li(v-for="resp in job.resp" style="list-style-type: circle") {{resp}}

</template>
<script lang="ts">
import { Component, Prop, Vue } from 'vue-property-decorator';
import * as ResumeData from '../resume';

@Component
export default class Resume extends Vue {
  data() {
    return {
      resume: null
    }
  }
  created() {
    this.$data.resume = ResumeData.default;
  }
}
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
#SkAwEdList {
  h5,
  h4 {
    margin-top: 20px;
  }
  ul {
    li {
      list-style-type: none;
      // padding-bottom: 3px;
    }
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
  }
  table {
    tr {
      td {
        border-top: none;
      }
    }
  }
}
</style>
